★★ Are you looking for a CHEAP, RELIABLE, and HIGH QUALITY VPS Hosting Provider? ★★

★★ Are you tired of OVERPAYING your old hosting provider for a service that just isn't right? ★★

The solution is here!

GreenValueHost is the web hosting industry's #1 "budget premium" hosting provider, specializing in providing our clients with high quality and affordable VPS hosting solutions in 6 of our world class data center locations (Buffalo, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, Seattle, and Amsterdam).

We are a privately owned hosting company (Green Value Hosting, Inc) registered in the U.S. state of Illinois since October, 2012. We host tens of thousands of websites from thousands of clients around the world, and we would love to have the opportunity of serving you!

★★ GreenValueHost is OVERSTOCKED! Through bulk pricing from our upstream data centers, we've stocked up on a MASSIVE amount of extra hardware, nodes, and IPv4 addresses and we want to pass the savings on to YOU! ★★
